name: NBCNews
text:
NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell apologizes to players for not listening to concerns regarding racism

"We, the National Football League, admit we were wrong for not listening to NFL players earlier and encourage all players speak out and peacefully protest" https://t.co/MLO1cSRGyM

name: NBCNews
text: Less than half of all black Americans currently have a job, an employment-to-population ratio that is “massively alarming,” one economist said. https://t.co/zOt9syMdYq

name: NBCNews
text: People are engaging in extremely dangerous behaviors — including gargling with bleach — in an effort to prevent COVID-19, CDC report finds. https://t.co/FaL1eWZYIG

name: NBCNews
text: "The pattern that we see in this case is similar to patterns we've seen in ICE arrests outside of courthouses," one attorney said. "They didn't identify themselves, they terrified him, they were pushing their guns at him" https://t.co/NNYORZFEcr

name: NBCNews
text: US Supreme Court may consider making it easier to sue police for misconduct; justices are weighing the issue known as "qualified immunity," which protects law enforcement. https://t.co/ur6phN2RiO

name: NBCNews
text: Analysis: Black Americans have grown tired of being forced to make the case for their citizenship, their humanity, their very survival — again and again and again. https://t.co/vGVxFcAM5H - @JanellRoss

name: NBCNews
text: A Republican state senator in Virginia is facing backlash from members of her own party after she said that the removal of Confederate statues is an "overt effort to erase all white history." https://t.co/kKdpMFPEH3

name: NBCNews
text: California AG Becerra announced the state's Justice Dept. will undertake an "expansive review" of the Vallejo Police Dept., where police shootings led to protests, accusations of biased policing, lawsuits and residents' demands for an outside investigation https://t.co/jI5Pg6fko3

name: NBCNews
text: A man seen in a video wielding a chainsaw at protesters in Texas has been detained by police, according to the McAllen Police Dept. https://t.co/M7q0KemGsT

name: NBCNews
text: Both officers have been suspended without pay, and their cases have been referred to the Department Advocate for disciplinary action, Police Commissioner Dermot Shea said. https://t.co/4JcsKEndl9

name: NBCNews
text: RT @DatelineNBC: She’d been missing just two days when the hurricane hit… #Dateline tonight at 10/9c. https://t.co/AMfNPTn3v7
